channel.title: Attack Attack
channel.description:
Anyone listen to them?
I figured you guys would like them. Their myspace music sucks, I recommend looking at them via youtube, or better yet, torrent their album, even better, buy it lol.
But yeah. It's not generic deathcore so.
I like them a lot because it basically combines all my old favorite bands into one.
Basically, kickass breath carolina type techno bits. tpain autotune effect on a before their eyes style singing. underoath type screaming and guitar sometimes.
all in all I'd definitely recommend them.

item.title: Attack Attack
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

[quote=“R.I.P RSC, post:5, topic:244473”][quote author=SomethingToHide link=topic=320815.msg2538637#msg2538637 date=1226872899]
On the CD, the intro is kinda a 30sec rap song, just them introducing.
[/quote]

cRap shouldn’t be put on a Metal cd. It spoils it completely.[/quote]

Just think of a metal song with a rap beat.
They’re not rapping, just saying who they are.

Read full topic

item.title: Attack Attack
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

On the CD, the intro is kinda a 30sec rap song, just them introducing. It would sound kickass if it was an actual song.

And it leads into the next song which starts off with a breakdown matching the intro.

That’s why I’d recommend just downloading the CD

Read full topic
